name: My First Website
description: This was my first project, my very first webpage. Learned alot about interacting with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Mirrors me of being very serious inside but with a playful outside.

name: BMI Calculator
description: As a personal trainer, I wouldn't urge you to focus on BMI. Anyway,  as a developer, it was very fun to create this simple calculator using JavaScript.

name: Adress Book
description: A simple adress book built in JavaScript, where you can store your contacts in your computer's local storage.
